page.description: Allows a user to change his logon password
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_change_user_password(C user_name ,C old_password ,C new_password )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. (TRUE) if the change was successful. .F. (FALSE) otherwise.

page.discussion: The A5_CHANGE_USER_PASSWORD() function allows an administrator to change a user's password.
